page.title: 12Local History of Helford
page.content: ANCIENT SITES Halnoweth : formerly a nunnery dedicated to St Martin of Tour,and from this the parish took its name.Gear Farm: St Martin Ancient camp,14 miles in circumference. Caervallack :St Martin _Ancient camp. Merthen:Earthwork. Kestle: Manaccan_ earthwork.Tregonwell: Manaccan_ Ruined remains of a monastic chapel.Remains of holy well.Old burial ground. SUPERNATURAL Ghost of lady in long dress at Tremayne farmhouse. Feeling of a heavy arm across the chest at night in Tremayne House. PLACE NAMES Carn Bargus_Rocky place of the buzzard. Henforth_Old Road Tremayne_Stone house. Choon_Downland Tregonwell_3 Farms around a well. Bonnal_Place at the base of the wall. Withan_Place of trees. Landrivick_Small homestead. Sworne_Farmstead in nook of hills.
